adv: The related views, while not always being directly useful, offer ideas for directions to explore or to ignore without having to explicitly consider them.
disadv: I found that the choices of aggregation (lack of) and encoding in the suggested views were often not useful. Suggested views using the Airline or Airport fields resulted in large views occupying lots of space in the list while I found myself ignoring them completely as they were giving too much detail to gain an understanding of the dataset (I would have like to block these fields)
